text: mahapolove særisara ovunata pera sitiyavunge avasanaya kese vi dæyi ovuhu nobæluvehu da? ovuhu movunata vada saktiyen adhika vuha. ovuhu mahapolove asvædduha. movun palanaya kala dæta vada ovuhu eya adhika lesa paripalanaya kaloya. ovun veta ovunge dutavaru pæhædili sadhaka samanga pæminiyaha. ovunata aparadha kirimata allahta noviya. enamut ovuhu ovunatama aparadha karagannan vuha
